resources:
On Android 6.0 and up, we need permission for accessing location to make Bluetooth work properly. Without that, this application will not be able to discover Sesames. Auto Unlock While checking the current distance(in gray) between your smartphone and Sesame, set the range(in green) where you want Auto Unlock to work.\nAutomatically unlocks via Bluetooth when the phone is nearby.
